Here is a sample business letter you can use as a template:

[Your Name]
[Your Address]
[City, State ZIP Code]
[Email Address]
[Phone Number]
[Date]

Data Protection Office 
[Office Address]
[City, State ZIP Code]

Dear Sir/Madam,

Re: Request for Erasure of Personal Information

I am writing to exercise my right to request the erasure of all copies of my personal information held by your office,agency/organization (hereinafter referred to as "the Office").

Here is a sample business letter you can use as a template:

[Your Name]
[Your Address]
[City, State, ZIP]
[Email Address]
[Phone Number]
[Date]

Data Protection Office 
[Office Address]
[City, State, ZIP]

Dear Sir/Madam,

Re: Request for Erasure of Personal Information

I am writing to exercise my right under the [insert relevant data protection regulation, e.g., General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) or equivalent national law] to request that your office takes immediate action to erase all copies of my personal information from your records.

Here is a sample business letter you can use as a template:

[Your Name]
[Your Address]
[City, State, ZIP Code]
[Email Address]
[Phone Number]
[Date]

Data Protection Office 
[Their Address]
[City, State, ZIP Code]

Dear Sir/Madam,

Re: Request for Erasure of Personal Information 

I am writing to exercise my rights under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and request that your office takes immediate action to erase all copies of my personal information from your records.

Here is a sample business letter you can use as a template:

[Your Name]
[Your Address]
[City, State ZIP Code]
[Email Address]
[Phone Number]
[Date]

Data Protection Office [or specific office name]
[Office Address]
[City, State ZIP Code]

Dear Data Protection Officer,

Re: Request for Erasure of Personal Information

I am writing to exercise my right under the [applicable data protection law/regulation, e.g., GDPR, CCPA] to request that your office takes immediate action to erase all copies of my personal information from your records.
As per my knowledge, to date,2016I have had interactions with your agency in various capacities.

My personal details are as follows:

* Full name: [Your Full Name]
* Date of birth: [Your Date of Birth]
* Email address: [Your Email Address]
* Phone number: [Your Phone Number]
* Any other relevant identifier(s): [List any other unique identifiers associated with your personal information]

I hereby request that you delete all my personal information from your databases, systems, and records.

My personal details that I wish to have erased are as follows:

* Full name: [Your Name]
* Email address: [Your Email Address]
* Phone number: [Your Phone Number]
* Any other relevant identifiers (e.g., IP addresses, user IDs): [List any other relevant identifiers]

I would like to request that all my personal information is permanently deleted from your databases, to prevent any further processing or storage.
This includes any and all digital and physical copies of my data that may be stored in your systems or archives.
This includes any backups or archived data that may contain my personal information.
This includes, but is not limited to, all digital and physical copies, backups, and archives.
Please confirm in writing that you have received this request and indicate the actions you will take to comply with it.
Please confirm in writing that my request has been received and indicate the actions your office will take to comply with my request.
Please confirm in writing within [timeframe, e.g., 30 days] that you have taken the necessary steps to erase my personal information.
